title: If a butcher is doing Udhiya sacrificing on my behalf does he need to say any specific words
transcript: from India my question is if I don't know how to slaughter an animal Foria udia and I tell butcher to do it for me does he need to say some words before sacrificing for example I I am sacrificing this animal on behalf of so and so no it is not a must as long as he says and you're the one who's ordering him to slaughter for your this is sufficient inshallah
